query.name: userInsertQuery
query.sql: INSERT INTO USER (USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PASS) VALUES (USER_SEQ.NEXTVAL,?,?)

query.name: userSelectQuery
query.sql: SELECT USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, PERSON_ID FROM PERSON_USER

query.name: userSelectQueryByProject
query.sql: SELECT USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, PERSON_ID FROM PERSON_USER WHERE DEFAULT_PROJ=?
